title: Your Opal fare has changed
description: Starting 14 July 2025, Opal fares have been increased by 2.5% for the annual consumer price index (CPI) movement.

title: Trackwork – City Trains Oct 31 – Nov 2
description: Trackwork will affect train services to and from the City from Friday 31 October to Sunday 2 November. Use "Plan your trip" feature before travelling.

title: 📍 NYE Vantage Point Map
description: Find the best spots to watch the show! 🎆 Note: Circular Quay closes at 3pm and Milsons Point at 6pm. Walk from Wynyard or North Sydney.

title: 🎆 Celebrate NYE 2025!
description: See Sydney sparkle! Catch the 9pm Calling Country show or the Midnight fireworks. ✨ Check the official schedule for the latest updates.
